item.title: IntelliJ Idea
item.description: IntelliJ Idea is a popular IDE by Jetbrains. It allows several ways to share settings across team members in a project. krei stores its IntelliJ settings inside its git repository and thus should work out-of-the-box for other IntelliJ users. In case you have trouble getting krei to work in IntelliJ, take a look at the help section.
